fixes: Viewport configured for responsive design (Next.js 13+ format)
CSS Custom Properties used (IE not supported, modern browsers only)
Default Tailwind breakpoints (sm: 640px, md: 768px, lg: 1024px, xl: 1280px)
Responsive design implemented with 17+ responsive classes
Touch interactions properly implemented with hover/active states
Next.js image optimization with AVIF/WebP fallbacks
Custom image component with fallbacks and loading states
Font loading optimized for cross-browser performance
warnings: Consider polyfills if supporting older browsers

recommendations.title: Excellent Compatibility
recommendations.description: Your application has strong cross-browser support
